name: Rock Roach
description: The Rock Roach is a sturdy medium beast with two brains, allowing it resilience in combat. Its brown, rocky exterior provides camouflage in rugged terrain, and it possesses powerful biting attacks coupled with acid-spitting abilities.
memorable: The Rock Roach's Dual Brain allows it to function normally even when its head is destroyed, making it a remarkably tough opponent.
goals: The Rock Roach seeks to defend its territory and attack intruders with its biting and acid attacks.
relations: Rock Roaches may be encountered with other beasts or in underground environments.
environment: Typically found in rocky or underground environments.
strengths: Has resistance to bludgeoning damage and benefits from its Dual Brain ability.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma scores limit its tactical capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack with bite or Acid Spit, dealing piercing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Dual Brain grants it resilience against Intelligence-based effects even if severely injured.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to effectively navigate and attack in total darkness.
additional_information: Can continue functioning normally if its head is removed or destroyed.
Deals lingering acid damage with its Acid Spit ability.
Robust physical attributes for combat effectiveness.
Uses its Constitution modifier for Intelligence saving throws as long as both brains are intact.
Average Dexterity allows for decent initiative and movement agility.
test_queries: beast that spits acid and bites
creature with two brains and burrow speed
acidic attacker with high hit points
tough beast with a unique dual brain ability
